### sections  {.smaller}


* tons of ‘‘sections’’
* not actually needed/used to run program
* size, file offset, flags (code/data/etc.) 

   * location in executable <it>and</it> in memory

* some sections aren't stored (no ‘‘CONTENTS’’ flag)  

   * just all zeroes



### selected sections  {.smaller}

<table>
<tr><td><code>.text</code></td><td>program code</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.bss</code></td><td>initially zero data [ (block started by symbol)]{.my-small}</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.data</code></td><td>other writeable data</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.rodata</code></td><td>read-only data</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.init</code>/<code>.fini</code></td><td>global constructors/destructors</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.got</code>/<code>.plt</code></td><td>dynamic linking related</td></tr>
<tr><td><code>.eh_frame</code></td><td>try/catch related</td></tr>
</table>
